attributes.action: Make the use of animal testing in cosmetics illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details: www.facebook.com/ncsstopanimalcruelty - see our Facebook page for more information about the subject and what we are doing to help the issue.
attributes.background: We are a group from NCS, The Challenge, funded by the government and we are setting up a campaign against the use of animal testing and trying to ban it in the UK. We feel very passionate about this subject and think its disgusting the way that that animals are treated.
